mcq.statement: Which clause was included in the Treaty of Madras after the First Anglo-Mysore War?

options.a: Britain would cede territory to Mysore
options.b: Britain would assist Hyder Ali if attacked by neighbouring States
options.c: Hyder Ali would pay war indemnity

mcq.one_liner: The Treaty of Madras included a clause that **Britain would assist Hyder Ali if he was attacked by neighbouring States**.
